name: Beat Arena
description: Mobile game in which I work from its creation to the current softlaunch. Combines rhythmic mechanics, with lootboxes, inventory, and progression of today's best-known mobile games

name: Eggszy
description: Android Game that i created in 2017 in Unity3D. I remastered this game in 2020, adding some cool features, like a skins system, ads, In app purchases
